H0.text: Who is associated with the words ‘Live long and prosper’. Leonard Nimoy

H1.text: Who is associated with the words ‘Live long and prosper’. Gene Roddenberry

H2.text: Who is associated with the words ‘Live long and prosper’. Spock Impersonator

H3.text: Who is associated with the words ‘Live long and prosper’. Spock

A4.text: The gesture was devised by Star Trek actor Leonard Nimoy as a salute for the alien Vulcan species.

A5.text: The phrase was scripted by Theodore Sturgeon.
